## Description
Implement the **Business Source License (BSL 1.1)** to protect the commercial rights of Edge Hive while keeping source code available.

## Terms
- **Change Date**: 4 years
- **Change License**: Apache 2.0
- **Restriction**: No "Edge Hive-as-a-Service" by third parties.
- **Allowed**: Personal use, Internal business use, Non-commercial dev.
